autopilotIp.title: IP address of the drone's autopilot
autopilotIp.description: IP used to create a connection with the autopilot.

autopilotPort.title: Port of the drone's autopilot
autopilotPort.description: Port on which autopilot service is running.

droneGuidList.title: List of drones computer ID
droneGuidList.description: List of computer ID of drones in the swarm

isASimulation.title: Set the flight as a simulation
isASimulation.description: The option used to determine if the flight is real or if it is a simulation. This affects the context of the flight (e.g. if the take off is manual or automatic).

multicastIpv6.title: IP of the multicast group
multicastIpv6.description: IP address used to communicate with the other drones.

flightScript.title: Script's URL of the flight
flightScript.description: URL of the script which will be executed for the flight. This URL must be publicly accesible so that the drone can fetch the script.

subscriberGuidList.title: List of subscribers computer ID
subscriberGuidList.description: List of computer ID of swarms subscribers (entities able to listen/send OPC-UA messages from/to the swarm)
